title: Rebecca Kase, LCSW, Unveils New Book: The Polyvagal Solution
text:
Rebecca Kase, LCSW, Unveils New Book: The Polyvagal Solution 04-23-2025 10:44 PM CET | Associations & Organizations
Press release from: ABNewswire
The official launch date is May 1st; preorders are now open for a transformative new guide to emotional regulation and resilience
Fox Island, Washington - April 23, 2025 - Rebecca Kase, LCSW, a nationally recognized trauma therapist and founder of the Trauma Therapist Institute [ https://www.traumatherapistinstitute.com ], has announced the release of her highly anticipated new book, The Polyvagal Solution: Vagus Nerve-Calming Practices to Soothe Stress, Ease Emotional Overwhelm, and Build Resilience ("The Polyvagal Solution").
The Polyvagal Solution [ https://www.amazon.com/Polyvagal-Solution-Nerve-Calming-Practices-Resilience/dp/1648484123 ] offers practical guidance on developing resilience in the face of everyday stress. It provides an in-depth explanation of polyvagal theory through a scientific lens, highlighting how the vagus nerve functions as the body's emotional control center and is activated during overwhelming situations.
"Polyvagal Theory doesn't have to stay stuck in academic language," says Rebecca Kase. "I wrote this book to make it practical, relatable, and usable-so anyone can start healing from the inside out."
As Kase explains in the book, learning to activate and strengthen the polyvagal nerve helps calm the stress cycle and achieve peace. The Polyvagal Solution includes examples of simple nervous system health exercises, immediate anxiety relief techniques, and personalized stress management tools. These tools will help control emotions while soothing the nervous system, restoring daily balance and joy.
The book has already received praise from mental health professionals, coaches, and entrepreneurs. Preorders for The Polyvagal Solution are available now, and to the general public everywhere books are sold starting May 1, 2025.
About Rebecca Kase:
Rebecca Kase, LCSW, is a leading voice in trauma therapy, self-help, and business success. With over 18 years of experience, she blends neuroscience, nervous system regulation, and real-world business acumen to help individuals and entrepreneurs break through limits and thrive. As the founder of the Trauma Therapist Institute [ https://www.traumatherapistinstitute.com/ ] and the author of "The Polyvagal Solution" (coming May 2025), Rebecca is on a mission to demystify healing and success, proving that both are deeply intertwined. Whether training therapists, coaching high-performing professionals, or speaking on stages, Rebecca brings a no-BS, deeply informed approach to creating lasting change. Rebecca has been featured in Oprah Daily, Newsweek, Los Angeles Tribune, and more.
